Besides this, I have completed courses related to machine learning, like deep learning from Coursera. I know how to design using various algorithms.

education.school: VVDAV Public School, Vikas puri, New Delhi

work.title: Computer Vision Engineer
work.description:
Developed and optimized an image classifier using multiple architectures (EfficientNet-B4, B7, ResNet-50, 100) to differ-entiate bag-containing images, conducting accuracy evaluations, employing diverse loss functions, implementing adaptivetraining, and converting the final model into ONNX for seamless application integration.
Engineered an LSTM-based model analyzing 50 sequential frames to detect person collapses, including independent datasetcuration, model training from scratch, inference script creation, incremental training for ongoing accuracy improvement,reducing false alerts by 20%.
Segmentation of a trained model into CNN and RNN components for ONNX model creation, feature extraction orchestra-tion, and customized person detection by fine-tuning a generalized model.
Enhanced existing ANPR with 30% increase its processing speed and 4% improvement in accuracy by optimizing the OCRalgorithm.â€¢ Created a generic OCR solution capable of accurately interpreting text written on any surface with enough contrast.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description:
Integrated multiple SMS gateways, payment gateways, third-party PoS, and e-commerce platforms, which expanded reach, improved customer engagement, and streamlined transactions leading to increased sales. 
Took care of customer support tickets. Providing timely assistance and resolving inquiries ensuring customer satisfaction. 
Utilized APIs, Webhooks, and Crons to automate tasks on our platform, improving efficiency and enhancing user experience.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description:
Developed a fully responsive third party login feature without affecting the existing users and collect their email ids. Shifting users from getting an otp to login to simply login with Google , saving the company a ton of fortune from message provider. Creating a faster and simpler login experience for users.
 Also developed a polls feature for admin and users to interact among themselves with no more than 200 words for questions and 50 words for answer
